snippet: With the end of the Oklahoma City Thunder’s season, the veteran Derek Fisher could have tantalizing opportunities as a coach or an executive, in television or even in politics — that is, if he does not continue playing.
abstract: Oklahoma City Thunder veteran Derek Fisher will have several tantalizing career opportunities should he choose to retire as a player after current season; 40-year-old guard could become a coach, an executive, or even try a career in television or in politics.
lead_paragraph: With the end of the Oklahoma City Thunder’s season, the veteran Derek Fisher could have tantalizing opportunities as a coach or an executive, in television or even in politics — that is, if he does not continue playing.

headline.main: Next Move for Fisher: Coaching, or Maybe Politics
headline.print_headline: Next Move for Fisher: Coaching, or Maybe Politics
